name: Gaurang Engineering
overview:
Established in the year 1998, we, “Gaurang Engineering Works”, are a prominent name engaged in manufacturing and exporting a comprehensive assortment of Pressure Vessels, Oil Cooler and Heat Exchangers. and manufacture of ms & ss heavy light fabrication and many more.

Our Team: Procuring agents Production personnel Quality controllers Mangers Administrators

Our Infrastructure: We hold a sound infrastructure setup at Thane (Maharashtra), India. With due consideration, we have thoughtfully segregated our setup in different units to streamline entire business operations. Each segregated setup is installed with latest machinery and equipments that are proficiently managed by our team, making us to complete undertaken production projects within determined time-frame.

Quality Policy: We have able to gain credibility in this discipline owing to our qualitative Pressure Vessels, Oil Cooler and Heat Exchangers. To ensure its optimum-quality, we carry out stringent quality checks at every stage of the manufacturing process. The entire production of this range is proficiently executed under the supervision of our qualified professionals.

Why Us?: Some of our salient features are: Vast distribution network Timely delivery Competitive price range International quality standards Supreme quality
